name: misogynistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing feelings of hating women or a belief that men are better than women: I am amazed by some of the misogynistic attitudes in this country. She is married to a misogynistic bully.
More examplesFewer examplesI'm fed up with your misogynistic remarks.He revealed a deeply misogynistic streak, refusing to speak to female staff.His songs' lyrics have been described as misogynistic and homophobic.
